name: Colour Shoota
description:
Change your direction to change your bullet colour! Only same coloured bullets can defeat the enemies! Collect diamonds to increase your multiplier! You only have three lives, how long can you last?

Controls: WASD to move, LMB to shoot.

Music credits: Ecstasy X by Jason Shaw

UPDATE 13/8/2016 v1.0.1 - Added enemy explosions and diamond multipliers.

UPDATE 15/8/2016 v1.0.2 - Getting hit by an enemy when you're the same colour now doesn't damage you. Getting damaged destroys all multiplier diamonds onscreen.

UPDATE 18/8/2016 v1.0.3 - Target cursor now rotates, speeding up faster the more you are hit.
